title: `[lang]` attributes do not have a valid value
description: Specifying a valid [BCP 47 language](https://www.w3.org/International/questions/qa-choosing-language-tags#question) on elements helps ensure that text is pronounced correctly by a screen reader. [Learn more](https://web.dev/valid-lang/).

node.selector: div.field > p > span > a#COVID-19 PHE Hyperlink
node.snippet: <a href="https://aspr.hhs.gov/legal/PHE/Pages/default.aspx" lang="English" name="COVID-19 PHE Hyperlink" target="_blank" id="COVID-19 PHE Hyperlink" xml:lang="English">
node.explanation:
Fix all of the following:
  Value of lang attribute not included in the list of valid languages
